info.game_comments: Clip of this game shown in the eleventh Season 1 episode of House of Cards.

The bottom of a dropped Slinky remains stationary & then falls; in slow motion, you can see the bottom is in equilibrium between the downward pull of gravity & the upward pull of this force that tends to stretch, stress or elongate
